snippet: At a time when Facebook needs to increase its revenue, a federal judge in California rejected the proposed settlement of a class-action lawsuit targeting the company's most lucrative advertising tool.
abstract: At a time when Facebook needs to increase its revenue, a federal judge in California rejected the proposed settlement of a class-action lawsuit targeting the company's most lucrative advertising tool.

headline.main: Judge Raises New Questions About Facebook Advertising Tactic
headline.print_headline: Judge Rejects Settlement of Facebook Suit
